description: Promotion hopefuls Huddersfield Town rescue a point late on at home to bottom side Burton Albion in a draw at the John Smith's Stadium.
title: Huddersfield Town 1-1 Burton Albion
title_page: League One: Huddersfield Town 1-1 Burton Albion - BBC Sport
maintext:
This will be just the third league meeting between Huddersfield Town and Burton Albion after the pair both won one match apiece 1-0 during the 2016-17 season.
Both league meetings between Huddersfield and Burton have been won 1-0 via a goal in the 85th minute or later â€“ Nahki Wells (85th minute) for the Terriers in December 2016 and Jackson Irvine (90th minute) for the Brewers in April 2017.
Huddersfield have lost just two of their last 13 final league games of the year (W6 D5), winning four of their last five matches since 2019.
After failing to win their final Football League game of the year between 2017 and 2021 (D2 L3), Burton have since won each of their last two such matches.
